Hazel and her comrades quickly come up behind Axis.

Bronze: I will get to =
kick some ass here, right? I really want to kick ass...

Hazel: Uh...Well, =
what are we supposed to do first?

  ooC: The most likely reason for a long awaited r=
esponse is that I 
  had to reformat my computer, and i also had spent most=
 of a day 
  trying to fix it with out having to reformat. That and i'm abs=
ent 
  minded. =3DP

  --- Axis ---

  Axis enters the base through the mai=
n entrance, he stops just 
  through the entrance, and turns around, "Again=
, welcome to the 
  Chivitrons' base. Now, if you will please follow me," A=
xis heads to 
  the end of the hall, and waits for the rest to catch up.

 what about Hazel and her comrades? I had them follow Axis
